attributes.action: call for an election on the grounds that we the people have no confidence in the current government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are sick to death of taxes, broken promises, rising crime figures, and your intransigence in the face of public outrage for a war WE the people didn't want despite being in the second term of your government... for all or sakes, please go..... Now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
